title: The Timeline
description: After being assisted by our team and contributors, we finally present the milestones that we are seeking to  accomplish.
option1Description: Research and analysis of the current market situation.
option2Description: Whitepaper development. ICO financial model established.
option3Description: ICO Crowdsale buy UI developed. Smart Contracts deployed to ETH Main net.
option5Description: ICO Crowdsale ends on May 1st. Search for contributors and advisors.
option6Description: Team number increase to cover open positions. BRT token on exchanges.
option7Description: Development starts for further global expansion
option8Description: Development start for the Bramble mobile App solution (iOS/Android).
